title: Tom Pidcock Sticks with Pinarello For Cyclocross, Mountain Bike Ambitions after Split from Ineos Grenadiers
content:
Multi-discipline dynamo sidesteps the off-road range of Q36.5 bike partner Scott, commits to three-year partnership with Italian brand beneath Ineos Grenadiers.

Read the full article at Tom Pidcock Sticks with Pinarello For Cyclocross, Mountain Bike Ambitions after Split from Ineos Grenadiers on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
